definition: to fall in love with/to be in love with
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: The hero of the story is in love with a woman who--alas and alack--does not love him.
sentences.chinese: 主角爱上了一位女子，可是那女子并不爱他。

sentences.english: I entered the lobby, and loved the ambience immediately.
sentences.chinese: 一进到大厅，我马上爱上了那里的气氛。

sentences.english: But, when the hunter falls in love with prey, his inexorable doom often starts accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 但是，当猎人爱上猎物的时候，他的劫数常因此肇始。

sentences.english: The third reason to love someone is despite who they are.
sentences.chinese: 爱上某人的第三个原因是不管他们是怎样的人。

sentences.english: He was sitting in front of me and I fell in love with the back of his neck.
sentences.chinese: 他就坐在我的前面，我一下子爱上了他脖子的背影。

sentences.english: Once you love who you are, you will be totally free to love others.
sentences.chinese: 一旦爱上自己，你将能毫无芥蒂地爱上别人。

sentences.english: No man loves his fetters be they made of gold.
sentences.chinese: 即使脚镣黄金铸，无人爱上这刑具。

sentences.english: Learn to Iove whatever work you're doing.
If Jack's in love, he's no judge of Jill's beauty.
sentences.chinese: 如果杰克爱上了吉尔，吉尔再丑他也说俏丽。

sentences.english: Flight LiuChangLing fell in love with QingBaoChu mid-team leader of the MaXin blue captain.
sentences.chinese: 飞行中队长刘长岭爱上了情报处的马昕蓝上尉。

sentences.english: Also a homegrown musical "Love U, Teresa" has returned to Beijing's Poly Theater.
sentences.chinese: 本土音乐剧《爱上邓丽君》也回到北京的保利剧院。

sentences.english: Sondra Pransky: I'm a would-be investigative reporter who has fallen in love with the object of her investigation.
sentences.chinese: 我将像一名新闻调查员一样，爱上了自己调查的对象。

sentences.english: Ah-huh, someone has a crush on Jenny, doesn't he?
sentences.chinese: 啊哈，某人爱上詹妮了，对不对？

sentences.english: But she fell in love with this life is determined that a cup of tea.
sentences.chinese: 但她这辈子是决意爱上了那一杯奶茶。

sentences.english: Andrew has a crush on me. But jane likes john.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁爱上了简，可是简却迷上了约翰。

sentences.english: If have a devil falling in love with an angel this one type TV play?
sentences.chinese: 有没有魔鬼爱上天使这一类型的电视剧？

definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to be infatuated with/to be enchanted by/to be passionate about
want to stop but can't (idiom)/to be unable to stop oneself/to feel an urge to continue
to meet by chance/to run into sb/chance encounter
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
to fall in love/to love sb or sth dearly (lover, or art)

pinyin: ai4 de5 si3 qu4 huo2 lai2
